setting.name: trustcrm_md_member_group_ids
setting.title: Member Groups to Include
setting.description: Only contacts in these CiviCRM groups will be counted as members.

setting.name: trustcrm_md_gender_field
setting.title: Gender Field
setting.description: Contact field name or custom field token to use as gender.

setting.name: trustcrm_md_ethnicity_field
setting.title: Ethnicity Custom Field
setting.description: Custom field token for ethnicity (e.g. custom_12).

setting.name: trustcrm_md_geography_code
setting.title: Census Geography Code
setting.description: ONS/NOMIS geography code for your area (e.g. E10000007 for Derbyshire).

setting.name: trustcrm_md_dataset
setting.title: Census Dataset Label
setting.description: Arbitrary label to tag the loaded benchmark rows.

setting.name: trustcrm_md_category_mappings
setting.title: Category Mappings (JSON)
setting.description: JSON mapping of local values to census categories for gender and ethnicity.
